Reviews.Title: “Can't image a trip to LA without staying at Saharan !”

Reviews.Content: spent 8 nights saharan midcentury styled hotel situated sunset blvd heart hollywood stay saharan 1993 8th visit it’s home 20 renovations enjoyed comfortable bed clean spacious useful fridge tv cabled channels spotless bathroom complimentary soap shower gel body lotion shampoo neighbourhood coin laundry liquor shop ralphs 24 hours starbucks motel situated walkable distance world famous walk fame staff friendly helpful cleaning staff nice smiling efficient discovered cockroach microwave oven isolated incident recommend hotel course los angeles saharan motor hotel liked staff beds location value disliked tight parking don’t car
